data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Xya Latreille, 1809 from Shandong, China (Orthoptra, Tridctyloidea, Tridactylidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Da-Peng, Yin, Hai-Xiang, Yin, Zhan (2018): A new species of the genus Xya Latreille, 1809 from Shandong, China (Orthoptra, Tridctyloidea, Tridactylidae). Zootaxa 4455 (3): 593-596, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4455.3.17
